Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Luckymaxer
Pies = { {MeshId = 18417911, TextureId = 18417918, Name = "ApplePie", Scale = Vector3.new(0.35, 0.35, 0.35), Size = Vector3.new(1, 1, 0.25), Angle = CFrame.Angles(0, -(math.pi / 2), 0), Damage = 40}, {MeshId = 40312463, TextureId = 40311968, Name = "CherryPie", Scale = Vector3.new(0.9, 0.9, 0.9), Size = Vector3.new(1, 1, 0.25), Angle = CFrame.Angles(-(math.pi / 1.5), (math.pi / 2), 0), Damage = 15}, {MeshId = 40312463, TextureId = 40311869, Name = "BlueberryPie", Scale = Vector3.new(0.9, 0.9, 0.9), Size = Vector3.new(1, 1, 0.25), Angle = CFrame.Angles(-(math.pi / 1.5), (math.pi / 2), 0), Damage = 15}, {MeshId = 143518445, TextureId = 143499030, Name = "CherryPie", Scale = Vector3.new(0.5, 0.35, 0.5), Size = Vector3.new(1, 0.25, 1), Angle = CFrame.Angles(0, 0, -(math.pi / 2)), Damage = 30}, {MeshId = 65950268, TextureId = 65950352, Name = "PumpkinPie", Scale = Vector3.new(0.9, 0.9, 0.9), Size = Vector3.new(1, 1, 0.25), Angle = CFrame.Angles((math.pi / 2.5), (math.pi / 2), 0), Damage = 35}, {MeshId = 18453224, TextureId = 18453205, Name = "PumpkinPi", Scale = Vector3.new(0.35, 0.35, 0.35), Size = Vector3.new(1, 1, 0.25), Angle = CFrame.Angles(0, -(math.pi / 2), 0), Damage = 20}, {MeshId = 125732887, TextureId = 125728597, Name = "PizzaPie", Scale = Vector3.new(0.6, 0.6, 0.6), Size = Vector3.new(1, 0.25, 1), Angle = CFrame.Angles(-(math.pi / 20), 0, -(math.pi / 2)), Damage = 20} }
BaseUrl = "http://www.roblox.com/asset?id="
function FindAttachedHumanoid(part) local tpart = part while tpart.Parent do if tpart.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") then return tpart.Parent.Humanoid end tpart = tpart.Parent end return nil end
function MakeValue(class,name,value,parent) local temp = Instance.new(class) temp.Name = name temp.Value = value temp.Parent = parent return temp end
local Tool = script.Parent local Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle") local YellSound = Handle:WaitForChild("Sound") local AniScript = Tool:WaitForChild("AnimationPlayerScript") --http://www.roblox.com/Asset?ID=111898513"--http://www.roblox.com/Asset?ID=111880514" local ThrowAnimation = "http://www.roblox.com/Asset?ID=111898867"
local ThrowFace = "http://www.roblox.com/asset?id=111882478"
local ThrowTable= Instance.new("Part") do --ThrowTable.Shape = "Ball" ThrowTable = Handle:Clone() ThrowTable.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom ThrowTable.Size = Vector3.new(4.125, 2.25, 4.125) ThrowTable.CanCollide = true ThrowTable.Mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) end
local LookGyro = Instance.new("BodyGyro") LookGyro.maxTorque = Vector3.new(0,math.huge,0)
local ActivateLock=false
Tool.Activated:connect(function() if ActivateLock then return end ActivateLock = true local character = Tool.Parent local humanoid = character:WaitForChild("Humanoid") local torso = character:WaitForChild("Torso") local head = character:WaitForChild("Head") local face = head:FindFirstChild("face") local oldFace ="" if face then oldFace = face.Texture end humanoid.WalkSpeed = 0 LookGyro.cframe = torso.CFrame - torso.CFrame.p LookGyro.Parent = torso
local TorsoLookVector = torso.CFrame.lookVector
local ntable = ThrowTable:Clone() ntable.CFrame = torso.CFrame+(TorsoLookVector * 3) local TableClone = ntable:Clone() local TableCloneY = TableClone:Clone() TableCloneY.CFrame = TableCloneY.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(math.rad(90), 0, 0) TableCloneY.CFrame = TableCloneY.CFrame + TableCloneY.CFrame.lookVector * ((TableCloneY.Size.y / 2)) local TableCloneZ = TableCloneY:Clone() TableCloneZ.CFrame = TableCloneZ.CFrame
ntable.Parent = Workspace
local PiesUsing = {}
for i = 1, 3 do local TableCloneX = TableCloneZ:Clone() TableCloneX.CFrame = TableCloneZ.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, math.rad(90)--[[math.rad(((i == 1 and 90) or (i == 2 and -90) or 0))]], 0) local ChosenPie = Pies[math.random(1, #Pies)] local Pie = Instance.new("Part") Pie.Name = ChosenPie.Name Pie.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom Pie.Size = ChosenPie.Size TableCloneX.CFrame = TableCloneX.CFrame - TableCloneX.CFrame.lookVector * (ntable.Size.x) TableCloneX.CFrame = TableCloneX.CFrame + TableCloneX.CFrame.lookVector * ((ntable.Size.x / 2) + (i * Pie.Size.x)) Pie.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Pie.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth table.insert(PiesUsing, Pie) local Mesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") Mesh.MeshType = Enum.MeshType.FileMesh Mesh.MeshId = BaseUrl .. ChosenPie.MeshId Mesh.TextureId = BaseUrl .. ChosenPie.TextureId Mesh.Scale = ChosenPie.Scale Mesh.Parent = Pie Pie.Anchored = false game:GetService("Debris"):AddItem(Pie, 10) local HitDebounce = false Pie.Touched:connect(function(Hit) if Hit and Hit.Parent and Hit.Parent ~= character and not HitDebounce then local HitHumanoid = Hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if HitHumanoid and HitHumanoid.Health > 0 then HitDebounce = true local creator = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creator.Value = game:GetService("Players"):GetPlayerFromCharacter(character) creator.Name = "creator" game:GetService("Debris"):AddItem(Pie, 3) creator.Parent = HitHumanoid HitHumanoid:TakeDamage(ChosenPie.Damage) end end end) Pie.Parent = Workspace Pie.CFrame = TableCloneX.CFrame * ChosenPie.Angle local Gyro = Instance.new("BodyGyro") Gyro.maxTorque = Vector3.new(400000, 400000, 400000) Gyro.cframe = Pie.CFrame Gyro.Parent = Pie local Position = Instance.new("BodyPosition") Position.position = Pie.Position Position.maxForce = Vector3.new(math.huge, 0, math.huge) Position.Parent = Pie end
MakeValue("StringValue","aniId",ThrowAnimation,AniScript) wait(.5) YellSound:play() wait(.5) if face then face.Texture=ThrowFace end
for i, v in pairs(PiesUsing) do if v and v.Parent then v.BodyPosition:Destroy()
v.Velocity = TorsoLookVector * 100
local Force = Instance.new("BodyForce") Force.force = Vector3.new(0, (v:GetMass() * 9.81 * 5), 0) Force.Parent = v
end end
local bAVel = Instance.new("BodyAngularVelocity") bAVel.maxTorque = Vector3.new(math.huge,math.huge,math.huge) bAVel.angularvelocity = ((torso.CFrame*CFrame.Angles(0,math.pi/2,0)).lookVector*10) bAVel.Parent = ntable
local bVel = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") bVel.maxForce = Vector3.new(math.huge,0,math.huge) bVel.velocity = (torso.CFrame.lookVector*25) bVel.Parent = ntable
ntable.Touched:connect(function(part) --print("GotTouched:" .. part.Name) Spawn(function() if part.Name == "Terrain" then return end if part.Anchored then return end local hitHumanoid = FindAttachedHumanoid(part) if hitHumanoid then --print("HumanoidParent:"..hitHumanoid.Parent.Name) if hitHumanoid==humanoid then return end hitHumanoid.PlatformStand =true end if part.Size.x*part.Size.y*part.Size.z<=5*9*5 then part.Velocity = (Vector3.new((math.random()-.5)*2,math.random(),(math.random()-.5)*2).unit)*150 end wait(3) print("got past wait") if hitHumanoid then print("unplatformstanding") hitHumanoid.PlatformStand=false hitHumanoid.Jump = true end end) end)
wait(6) LookGyro.Parent = nil humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16 if face then face.Texture=oldFace end ntable.CanCollide = false game.Debris:AddItem(ntable,5) ActivateLock = false end)

function FindAttachedHumanoid(part) local tpart = part while tpart.Parent do if tpart.Parent:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') then return tpart.Parent.Humanoid end tpart = tpart.Parent end return nil end
script.ChildAdded:connect(function(nchild) local humanoid = FindAttachedHumanoid(script) local ani = Instance.new('Animation') ani.AnimationId= nchild.Value local aniTrack=humanoid:LoadAnimation(ani) aniTrack:Play() Delay(0, function() nchild:Destroy() end) end)
